body: ... and it seems that **both update components cannot update themselves**, the following image shows that the version number for both update components are still the old ones as compared the ones on the right which are imported after running the update for the current GH file: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I2UHAZfIP7YN0nRlyKfMX7ujSt9DbC*-INhBpyBNiIN2Vk68nKs*YSvE8EjmVYDiymvY*JuGCJtQA8f7TdP3l6*mMncdJex-/Image5.png)
